title: New: Burial – Truant & Rough Sleeper
body: Two new tracks from **[Burial](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18706-preview-burial-truantrough-sleeper/ "Preview: Burial – Truant/Rough Sleeper")**, “_Truant_” and “_Rough Sleeper_,” that could quite possible sneak into many ‘track of the year lists’, despite their precarious distance to 2013. The tracks leaked last night but you can now stream them in full without feeling guilty.
